original_title: Kiss The Sky – Eye Trick The I
overview: A feast for the eye, this essay on trompe-l’oeil, deception, privileges, seductions and false freedoms. The façade of public life hides the private lives of individuals and hidden agendas. We develop new skills to test our happiness in the non-stop flow of images and information. How to live in the post-privacy age?
title: Kiss The Sky – Eye Trick The I
